meta.content: Academics, character, leadership, Pre-K–8, transportation, sports, before and after-care. Apply today by filling out our pre-enrollment application.
Academics, Character, Leadership, Pre-K – 8th grade, elementary and middle school, transportation, sports, before and after care, Apply Today by filling out our Pre-Enrollment Application

div.p:
The stakeholders of Imagine East Mesa will enable students to succeed by equipping them with
academics, character, and leadership. All students will acquire and own leadership
opportunities. We will foster an academic environment that serves the needs of diverse learners.
Everyone will experience a positive environment that focuses on creating caring citizens.
